uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.network

Class NNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.network.NEntity
      • uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.network.NNode

  • public class NNode
extends NEntity
    Represents a node in the network-based instance representation.

        public void reset(CFrame cFrame)

        Parameters:

      • instanceRef

        public boolean instanceRef()
        Tests whether the node represents a reference to a specific existing instance, which will be the case if and only of it has been directly derived from an instance-level frame of IFrameCategory.REFERENCE category.
        Returns:
        True if node represents reference to specific existing instance

      • getInstanceRef

        public CIdentity getInstanceRef()
        Provides the identity of the referenced instance for nodes that represent references to specific existing instances.
        Returns:
        Identity of referenced instance, or null if not applicable

        Returns:

      • leadsToCycle

        public boolean leadsToCycle()
        Tests whether the node/link network emanating from this node contains any cycles.
        Returns:
        True if cycles detected

      • subsumesStructure

        public boolean subsumesStructure(NNode other)
        Tests whether the type and the current feature-values of this node subsume those of another node. For link features, value-subsumption testing involves a recursive invocation of the same node-subsumption testing operation. For number-valued features, value-subsumption is determinied via invocation of the CNumber.subsumes(uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.model.CValue<?>) method, and for string-valued features subsumption means string-equality.
        Parameters:
        other - Node to test for structure-subsumption by this one
        Returns:
        true if this nodes structure subsumes that of other node
